questions.question: What is the sum of the first 5 positive integers?
Find the number of subsets of the set \(A = \{1, 2, 3, 4\}\).
What is the value of \(P(5, 2)\), the number of permutations of 2 items chosen from a set of 5?
Find the value of \(C(6, 3)\), the number of combinations of 3 items chosen from a set of 6.
If a graph has 10 vertices and each vertex has degree 3, how many edges does the graph have?
What is the greatest common divisor (GCD) of 36 and 60?
What is the least common multiple (LCM) of 12 and 18?
How many ways can you arrange the letters in the word 'DISCRETE'?
